title: Title 6 - DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Chapter I - FISH AND WILDLIFE (Subchapter A to J)
